entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
